title: Chessle Tutorial
description: Chessle is a fun online game that tests your knowledge of chess openings

steps.title: Green
steps.description: This move is correct and played on the right turn.

steps.title: Yellow
steps.description: This move is played by either white or black, but not on the specific turn you placed it.

steps.title: Gray
steps.description: This move is not played by either white or black in the solution.

steps.title: Win in 6 Tries
steps.description: You have a total of 6 attempts to guess the complete opening sequence correctly. With each guess, you should be able to narrow down the possibilities and eventually solve the puzzle.
